markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improvised Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=2102) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 199 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=82)

**Prerequisites**
[Weapon Improviser Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2099)

</column>

---

You can apply critical specialization effects to improvised weapons you wield. For any given improvised weapon, the GM determines which critical specialization effect is most applicable, based on the type of object it is.
name: Improvised Critical
